bookSourceComment:
搜索不到时可以尝试以下格式搜索
##完整书名

点击登录自定义发现
更改过发现要刷新本书源才会生效

❗️注意事项:
1、请不要退出晋江app的账号，只要点了退出，或者在其他地方登录了，都要重新抓token
2、更新token，书籍就要更新目录
loginUrl:
<js>
//请不要改书源的任何地方，请点击“登录”后再填写

function getToast(){
	java.toast("用来看的，别点了，确认请点右上角的✓")
	};
	
function login(){
	Map = source.getLoginInfoMap();
	Map == (Map == null||Map=="")?{}:Map
	let token = Map.get("登录请在这里填写app的token");
	token = (token==""||token==null)?"":token;
	java.log(token);
	
	let fl = Map.get("填写需要开启的分类序号（如2,4,5【默认为9,10】）");
	fl = (fl==""||fl==null)?"9,10":fl;
	java.log(fl);
	
	let bq = Map.get("填写需要开启的分类序号（如2【默认为5，只能单选】）");
	bq = (bq==""||bq==null)?"5":bq;
	 
	 option = {
	 	"token":String(token),
	 	"fl":String(fl),
	 	"bq":String(bq)
	 	}
	source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(option))
	
	}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
function decode(){ let v43,v38,dest; let respose = java.get(baseUrl,{"User-Agent": "Dalvik/2.1.0"}); let accesskey = String(respose.header("accesskey")); let keyString = String(respose.header("keystring")); let content = String(respose.body()); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v9 =0; let v6 = String(accesskey[accesskeyLen-1]).charCodeAt(); for(i=0;i v18){ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,(v18-v15)+v15) }else{ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,v17+v15) } let v32 = content.length; if((v6 & 1)!=0){ v38 = content.substring(v32-12,v32) dest = content.substring(0,v32-12) }else{ v38 = content.substring(0,12); dest = content.substring(12,content.length); } let key = java.md5Encode(v43+v38).substring(0,8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).substring(0,8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String(key), String(iv)).decryptStr(dest); return content } if(/jjwxc/.test(baseUrl)){ intro=String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g,''); /"content"/.test(result)?java.setContent(result):java.setContent(decode()); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getString("$..content"); saybody=java.getString("$..sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n【📢作者有话说】\n"+saybody:""; if(/token/.test(baseUrl)){ vipc=String(content).length > 30?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):java.getString("$..message")+"\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文"; result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{ result=intro+content+say } }else{ result="" } //评论开启 let bbb = book.getVariable("custom") let sss=source.getVariable() if(/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)){ let commentNum =/评论/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]; if(/chapterContent/.test(baseUrl)){ commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; }else if(/androidChapterBatchDownload/.test(baseUrl)){ body = baseUrl.match(/body":"(.*?)"/)[1]; commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?"+body+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0&commentSort=0" } comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); cflag = comment.code == "200" ? true:false; ccflag = comment.code == undefined ? true:false commentList = []; if(cflag || ccflag){ commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList ||[]; commentb = ""; }else{ commentb = comment.message } for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;title=$.chaptername;title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');intro=$.chapterintro;vip=$.isvip!='0';lock=$.islock!='0';type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

bbb = book.getVariable("custom");sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}
if(/章节名/.test(bbb) || /章节名/.test(sss)){
num=!type?"第"+$.chapterid+"章 ":'';
}
title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	fu = /目录简介【(.*?)】/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]:sss.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]
	title = title +fu+intro
	}else{
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}
l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号
填写[章节名]  ——  变为第xx章 章节名

填写 [目录简介【符号】] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现 符号：跟章节名连接时中间的符号，如 目录简介【 】，中间将为空格

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】

2、源变量（所有书）
同书籍变量

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(

    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));

        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

bookSourceComment:
建议登录
整理修改缝合：酷安 Wolken
灰色章节修复目录部分By叶落岚起+关耳/乃星改2021.8.3
补丁 : 神秘人
修复搜索问题
修复发现榜单没图的问题
修复章节内图片问题
新補丁: 神秘人
抓取源码中的关键字替换
更新补丁
更新补丁17/9
2023.9.27
新补丁：酷安 @吉王义昊
重新抓取源码中的关键字替换
2023.9.27
新补丁2nd：酷安 @吉王义昊
修复插图不能正常加载的问题
2023.9.30
酷安 @吉王义昊
添加登录URL
清理了无用代码
使用更易读的变量名
2023.10.1
酷安 @吉王义昊
重新抓取源码中的关键字替换
2023.10.1
酷安 @吉王义昊
在获取正文时自动拉取源码并解密进行关键字替换，一劳永逸（大概）解决问题
注意：此版本会使网络请求次数增加一倍，并一定程度上减慢加载速度
2023.10.1
酷安 @吉王义昊
增加登录URL和登录UI
启用CookieJar
去除章节名下方的URL
修正了下一页获取导致的正文加载错误
补全发现中的文库
修正部分小说目录获取错误的问题
2023.10.4
神秘人
根据网站代码更新修复
fix dynamic variable name
2023.10.6
網站大更新先前方法失效，用會回webview
2023.10.9
正文用改用class来match看会不会好一点
2023.10.13
新的匹配方式
2023.1111
目錄不穩定修復
2023.11.13
正文中含有title修復
2023.11.15
ua block fix, dynamic ua change everday
2023.11.23
fix some mirror redirect issue
2023.12.16
fix random duplicate text
2023.12.16
more complete way to fix
2024.1.1
search fix, more stable
search title fix
match bug fix
2024.1.17
add wait to catch rate limit
2024.1.17
整合发现(code from 柚屿☆)
2024.1.19
some performance fix

<js>
if(!cache.get("ua")){   	cache.put("ua",java.ajax("https://randua.somespecial.one/"),86400);
    	}
//!(/google.cn/).test(baseUrl)?h=java.getString("id.acontent@html"):h=decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.replace(/^.*?text=/, ''));
url = baseUrl.replace("www.bilinovel.com","tw.linovelib.com")
//re = java.ajax(url)
//h = java.webView(re,url,null);
//java.setContent(re); 
h = java.webView(src,baseUrl,null);
original_list = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children")

java.setContent(h)
h = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children");
//java.log(h[4])
//java.log(h.length)
if(h.length!=original_list.length){//there is repeat item
	

//replace to correct text
function confident(str1, str2){
	if(str1.length!=str2.length){
		return false; 
		}
		if(str1.length==0){
			return true;
			}
		confidence =0;
		target = Math.max(1,Math.floor(str1.length/2));
	for(let i=0;i<str1.length;i++){
		if(str1[i]==str2[i]){
			confidence++;
			if(confidence>=target){
				return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
k=0
for(let i=0;i<original_list.length;i++){
if(k>=h.length){
break;
}
ele = original_list[i]
str = String(java.getString("text",ele));
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log(str)
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(str.length)
//java.log(strcom.length)
while(k<h.length&&!confident(str,strcom)){
k++
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log("x")
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(strcom.length)
}

if(k<h.length){
if(java.getString("tag.script@all",ele)!= ""){
original_list[i] = h[0]
}else{
original_list[i] = h[k]
}
}

k++
}
h = original_list
}//close repeat item
else
{
	h = java.getString("tag.body@tag.div.5@html")
	}
//run readtools.js match words
//run js file's last line

//h=String(h);
//code = String(java.ajax(jsLink)).trim().split("\n").pop().trim().split(";")[1];

h
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
data = JSON.parse(result).data;
JSON.stringify({
	  "name": String(decode(data.Name)),
	  "author": String(decode(data.Author)),
	  "img": String(data.Img),
	  "desc": String(decode(data.Desc)),
	  "time": String(data.LastTime),
	  "new": String(data.LastChapter),
	  "kind": String(data.CName)+","+String(data.BookStatus),
	})
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleContent.content: var DEBUG = 0 var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric ); with(javaImport){ function decode(str){ var desede = DESede("CBC","PKCS5Padding",String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),String("SK8bncVu").getBytes()); return desede.decryptStr(str) } }; function toImg(Str){return Str.map(str=>``).join("\n")} Array.prototype.toImg=function (){return toImg(this,arguments[0])} var arr = String(decode(JSON.parse(result).data.content.match(/}+(.*)/)[1])).replace(/[\[\]"]/g,"").split(","); DEBUG?arr.slice(0,1).toImg():arr.toImg()

ruleExplore.author: $.Author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
var list = [];
JSON.parse(result).data.BookList.forEach(str=>{
	list.push({
		"Name":decode(str.Name),
		"Author":decode(str.Author),
		"Img":str.Img,
		"CName":decode(str.CName)+","+str.Score+"分",
		"Desc":decode(str.Desc),
		"Id":str.Id
		})
	})
JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$.*

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

bookSourceComment:
永久站A：https://shile.xyz/
永久站B：https://8fu.xyz/

ps：
删注释者减寿秃头倒大霉

使用指南：
若当前无法使用该源，原因有二
一、ip不对需切换网络
二、网站改新网址了

第一种情况 只需切换WIFI/流量/梯子即可
第二种情况 需按以下步骤操作
①复制永久站网址
②用浏览器打开该网址
③随机打开可用入口
④复制当前入口的网址
⑤将此源URL替换成复制的网址

注：
若两种情况都无法解决失效问题 
大概率网站改代码了 
随缘等人修复 主要看命
感谢关耳大大写的正文规则

2022.10.1 酷安@乃星

bookSourceComment:
1.登陆后阅读进度回自动同步云端，章节索引会自动跟随云端(App)进度，请在App里选择章节
2.登陆阅读限免或已购vip章节为空时, 试试书籍详情页, 源变量填：1
3.清除缓存再刷新

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "🔒":""
    let pc_url = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let mob_url = `https://m.qidian.com/book/${bid}/${chapter.id}.html`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${mob_url},{'webView': true}` : pc_url
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

bookSourceComment:
使用:先输入手机号然后点√发送验证码,后输入验证码登陆
注意:若发现出现错误,请重新打开关闭发现页
支持:验证码登陆|购买|签到|发现|书架
loginUrl:
<js>
var username = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("手机号"))
var passwd = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("验证码"))
// 工具类
var md5Key = 'NpkTYvpvhJjEog8Y051gQDHmReY54z5t3F0zSd9QEFuxWGqfC8g8Y4GPuabq0KPdxArlji4dSnnHCARHnkqYBLu7iIw55ibTo18'
var desKey = Packages.java.lang.String('ZUreQN0Epkpxh3pooWOgixjTfPwumCTYWzYTQ7SMgDnqFLQ1s9tqpVhkGf02we89moQwhSQ07DVzc3LWupRgbVvm29aYeY7zyFN').getBytes('UTF_8')
var des = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.DES("ECB","PKCS5Padding", desKey)
if(!username) throw new Error("请输入手机号")
// 发送验证码
if(username != 0 && passwd == 0) {
  let timestamp = Date.now()
  let requestId = java.randomUUID().replace('-','')
  let param = des.encryptBase64(JSON.stringify({phone: username,smsType: "1",timestamp: timestamp}))
  let sign = String(java.digestHex(java.base64Encode(`param=${param}&requestId=${requestId}&timestamp=${timestamp}&key=${md5Key}`),'md5')).toUpperCase()
  let data = JSON.stringify({
    param: param,
    requestId: requestId,
    sign: sign,
    timestamp: timestamp
  })
  let op = JSON.stringify({ method: "POST", body: data })
  let res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/login/getPhoneCode,${op}`))
  if(res.code != '200') throw new Error(res.msg)
  java.toast("验证码已发送，请输入验证码登录")
}
// 验证码登录
if(username != 0 && passwd != 0) {
  let timestamp = Date.now()
  let requestId = java.randomUUID().replace('-','')
  let param = des.encryptBase64(JSON.stringify({phone: username,phoneCode: passwd,timestamp: timestamp}))
  let sign = String(java.digestHex(java.base64Encode(`param=${param}&requestId=${requestId}&timestamp=${timestamp}&key=${md5Key}`),'md5')).toUpperCase()
  let data = JSON.stringify({
    param: param,
    requestId: requestId,
    sign: sign,
    timestamp: timestamp
  })
  let op = JSON.stringify({ method: "POST", body: data})
  let res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/login/phone,${op}`))
  if(res.code != '200') throw new Error(res.msg)
let userInfo = res.data.userInfo source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify({ "token": userInfo.token}))
  java.toast("登陆成功")
}
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
function getParams(params,isPost){
 let desKey = Packages.java.lang.String('ZUreQN0Epkpxh3pooWOgixjTfPwumCTYWzYTQ7SMgDnqFLQ1s9tqpVhkGf02we89moQwhSQ07DVzc3LWupRgbVvm29aYeY7zyFN').getBytes('UTF_8')
 let des = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.DES("ECB","PKCS5Padding", desKey)
 let md5Key = 'NpkTYvpvhJjEog8Y051gQDHmReY54z5t3F0zSd9QEFuxWGqfC8g8Y4GPuabq0KPdxArlji4dSnnHCARHnkqYBLu7iIw55ibTo18'
 let timestamp = Date.now()
 let requestId = java.randomUUID().replace('-','')
 let param = des.encryptBase64(JSON.stringify(Object.assign(params,{'timestamp': timestamp})))
 let sign = String(java.digestHex(java.base64Encode(`param=${param}&requestId=${requestId}&timestamp=${timestamp}&key=${md5Key}`),'md5')).toUpperCase()
 let data = JSON.stringify({
    param: param,
    requestId: requestId,
    sign: sign,
    timestamp: timestamp
 })
 return isPost? JSON.stringify({ method: "POST", body: data }) :`timestamp=${timestamp}&requestId=${requestId}&sign=${sign}&param=${encodeURIComponent(param)}`
}
let style1 = {"layout_flexGrow": 0,"layout_flexBasisPercent": 1}
let style2 = {"layout_flexGrow": 0.25,"layout_flexBasisPercent": -1}
let style3 = {"layout_flexGrow": 0,"layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.29}
let findList = [{"title": "༺个人中心༺ ","url": '',"style": style1},{"title": "每日签到","url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/sign/sign,${getParams({},true)}`,"style": style2},{"title": "个人书架","url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/bookrack/getUserBookRackList?${getParams({"pageNo":1,"pageSize":9999},false)}`,"style": style2}]
findList.push({"title": "༺男生分类༺ ","url": '',"style": style1})
// bookType: 1 代表男生. bookType: 4 代表女生
// 获取男生分类
res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/classify/getBookClassifyListByParams?${getParams({"classifyId":0,"pageNo":1,"pageSize":99,"bookType":"1"},false)}`))
res.data.classifyList.forEach(o=> {
  let params1 = getParams({"firstClassify":o.classifyId,"rankType":"1","pageNo": 1,"pageSize": 30,"bookType":"1"},false)
  findList.push({"title": o.classifyName, "url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/book/getBookListByParams?${params1}`,"style": style1})
  let len =  o.childList.length
  len>1&&o.childList.forEach((c,i)=>{
  	   let params2 = getParams({"firstClassify":o.classifyId,"rankType":"1","pageNo": 1,"pageSize": 30,"bookType":"1","secondClassify":c.classifyId},false)
  	  let style=i==len-1?style3:style2
    findList.push({"title":c.classifyName, "url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/book/getBookListByParams?${params2}`,"style":style})
  	})
})
// 获取男生标签
findList.push({"title": "༺ 男生标签༺","url": '',"style": style1})
res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/tag/getAppTagList?${getParams({"pageNo":1,"pageSize":99,"bookType":"1"},false)}`))
let tagLen =  res.data.list.length
res.data.list.forEach((o,i)=> {
  let params = getParams({"tagId":o.tagId,"rankType":"1","pageNo": 1,"pageSize": 30,"bookType":"1"},false)
  let style=i==tagLen-1?style3:style2
  findList.push({"title": o.tagName, "url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/book/getBookListByTagId?${params}`,"style": style})
})
JSON.stringify(findList)
</js>

<js>
(()=>{
var desKey = Packages.java.lang.String('ZUreQN0Epkpxh3pooWOgixjTfPwumCTYWzYTQ7SMgDnqFLQ1s9tqpVhkGf02we89moQwhSQ07DVzc3LWupRgbVvm29aYeY7zyFN').getBytes('UTF_8')

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var desKey = Packages.java.lang.String('ZUreQN0Epkpxh3pooWOgixjTfPwumCTYWzYTQ7SMgDnqFLQ1s9tqpVhkGf02we89moQwhSQ07DVzc3LWupRgbVvm29aYeY7zyFN').getBytes('UTF_8')
let content=Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.DES("ECB","PKCS5Padding", desKey).decryptStr(java.base64DecodeToByteArray(java.getString("data.chapter.content")))
let isBuy = java.getString("data.isBuy")=='0'
let isFee = java.getString("data.isFee")=='0'
let price = java.getString("data.price")
let payText = `\n本章是VIP章节，购买后才能阅读\n本章需要${price}币`
isBuy&&!isFee ? content + payText  : content
</js>

}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false

var json=java.getElement("@css:.volume-wrap h3,.volume-wrap li");
list=[];
for(i in json){
	vol=json[i].select("a").attr("class");
	if(vol.indexOf("subscri")!=-1){
		volname=json[i].text();
		list.push({
			text:"★"+String(volname).replace(/.共\d+章.*|.订阅本卷/g,'')+"★",
			voltype:true
			})
		}else{
a=json[i].select("a")
			vip=json[i].select("em.iconfont").text()!=""?"🔒":""
			
			text=a.text();
			href=a.attr("href");
			time=a.attr("alt");
			href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
			
			list.push({
			text:String(vip+text).replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*?[求更谢乐发订合补加].*?[】）\)].*/g,''),
			href:href,
			time:String(time).replace(/.*?时间：(.*?)章节字数：(\d+)/,'$1•$2字'),
			voltype:false
			})
	}
	}
list
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    name:String(booklet.vN),
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"🔒":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        name: String(vip+chapter.cN),
        url: href,
        time:"更新时间:"+String(chapter.uT)+"  字数:"+String(chapter.cnt),
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "🔒":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

.dht_dl_area@script@html
<js>
function reurl(a){var b='';var c=csplit(a,8).split('\r\n');for(var i=0;i<(c.length-1);i++){b=b+String.fromCharCode((parseInt(c[i],2)-10).toString(10))}return b}

function csplit(a,b,c){b=parseInt(b,10)||76;c=c||'\r\n';if(b<1){return false}return a.match(new RegExp(".{0,"+b+"}","g")).join(c)}

r=result.match(/(reurl[^)]+\))/)[1]
s=eval('('+r+')')
result="magnet:?xt=urn:btih:"+s
</js>

result = java.get(baseUrl,{}).body();
try{
callback=result.match(/callback='(.*?)';\s+/)[1];
book = result.match(/load_more\('(\d+)','(\d+)'\)/);
url = 'https://jingpinshucheng.com/index.php?c=book&a=content.jsonp&callback='+callback+'&book_id='+book[1]+'&id='+book[2]+'&b='+base64(callback);
html = JSON.parse(String(java.get(url,{"referer":baseUrl}).body()).replace(/^.*?\(|\);$/g,'')).content;
}catch(e){
	html = ""
	}
java.setContent(result);

 java.getString("@@id.content@p@html")+html
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
var 电话号码=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("电话号码")||result.get("电话号码")

var 验证码=source.getLoginInfoMap().get( "验证码")

var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
lll=[
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token=",
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}

function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}

num=电话号码;
function getVerificationCode(){
	//获取验证码
 list2=lll;
list2.push( "mobile=86"+num);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2);
option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/message/send,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
java.toast(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");

	}


function login(){
	//登录
	
	y=验证码
	list2=lll;
list2.push("mobile=86"+num);
list2.push("code="+y);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2)

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}

url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
source.putLoginHeader(a.data.user_token=="undefined"?"":a.data.user_token)

java.toast(a.msg=="success"?'获取token成功':JSON.stringify(a));

}

</js>

bookSourceComment:
/*
如要登录，请先删源变量了Token的值再获取验证码
填写token=登录
需填写token的地方
1.源变量
2.发现页的每日福利跟书币余额<不领的话可不填>
感谢酷安@渊呀  指导
34304776fc02d974a641eef13b603e20
*/
/*
调试->右上角的小虫子，随便搜一个词
Token写了东西的话要删掉才能进行下面步骤：
①填上电话号码点调试会获取验证码；
②填上验证码点调试会获取token；
③把token填在Token【目录的章节url那也有个token记得也要填，不填的话从发现点的书是没有登录的】；
④把电话号码跟验证码的值删了【❗️填了电话号码会一搜索就发验证码】，保存书源
如登录过期需要重新登录，请删除以前填写的token再调试获取验证码，重复前面的步骤
*/
	
v=source.getVariable()
v==""||v==null?
((v="电话号码=\n验证码=\nToken="),source.setVariable(v)):""
var 电话号码= v.split("\n")[0].match(/\d+$/),
  验证码 = v.split("\n")[1].match(/\d+$/),
  Token = v.split("\n")[2].match(/[^=]*$/);
  
电话号码==null?java.toast("\n❤️使用前，请看源注释❤️"):""
电话号码=电话号码!=null?String(电话号码[0]):""
验证码=验证码!=null?String(验证码[0]):""
Token=Token!=null?String(Token[0]):""
java.log(Token)

<js>
var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
lll=[
"appId=",
"time="+time,
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}
function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}

if(!baseUrl.match(/welfare\/award/)){
if(baseUrl.match(/bookid/)){
java.put('token',baseUrl.match(/token=(.*)/)[1]);
java.put('book',baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1]);
list=[{"name":"书币余额","book_id":baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1]}];
result=JSON.stringify(list)
}else{

page=java.get('page');
cat=baseUrl.match(/cat=(\d+)/)[1];
finished=baseUrl.match(/finished=(\d+)/)[1];
li=lll;
li.push("finished="+finished);
li.push("cat="+cat);
li.push("page_num="+page);
sign=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+sign);
j=toJson(li);

option={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(j)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/book/category-index,'+JSON.stringify(option);
java.ajax(url)}}else{
l=[];
var token=baseUrl.match(/token=(.*)/)[1];
li=lll;
li.push("read_time=44800");
li.push("token="+token);
s=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+s);
j=toJson(li);
option={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(j)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/remain/add-read-time,'+JSON.stringify(option);
l.push(String(java.ajax(url)));
for(i=1;i<=10;i++){
url='http://api.lestory.cn/welfare/award?token='+token+'&award_type='+i;
l.push(String(java.ajax(url)));
}
for(i=1;i<=15;i++){
url='http://api.lestory.cn/welfare/award?token='+token+'&award_type='+i;
l.push(String(java.ajax(url)));
}
for(i=1;i<=15;i++){
url='http://api.lestory.cn/welfare/award?token='+token+'&award_type='+i;
l.push(String(java.ajax(url)));
}
result=JSON.stringify(l);}
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));


//下面不要动
var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
token=java.put('token',Token);
lll=[
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token="+token,
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}

function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}



//获取验证码开始
num=电话号码;
y=验证码;
if(num.match(/^\d{11}$/) && !y  && !Token){
list2=lll;
list2.push( "mobile=86"+num);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2);
option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/message/send,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
java.log(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");
}else if(y && !Token){
list2=lll;
list2.push("mobile=86"+num);
list2.push("code="+y);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2)

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
java.log(a.msg=="success"?'❗️下面是你的Token，请复制❗️\n'+a.data.user_token:JSON.stringify(a));
}
//获取验证码结束

li=lll;
li.push("page_num="+page);
li.push("keyword="+key);
s1=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+s1);
j=toJson(li);
option={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(j)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/book/search,'+JSON.stringify(option)
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}

loginUrl:
<js>
function getCode(type){
	try{
		phone = result.get("账号");
		
	url = "https://www.himehear.com/tjapp/v1/common/verifyCode";
	body={
		"messageType":1,
		"sendType":type,
		"account":String(phone)
		}
		
		option = {
			"method":"POST",
			"body":JSON.stringify(body)
			}
			
			url = url+","+JSON.stringify(option);
			
	  	JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).code==0?java.toast("验证码发送成功，请注意查收"):java.toast("验证码发送失败，请稍候再试");
	  	
			}catch(e){
				java.log(e)
				}
				
	}


function login(){
	phone = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号");
	code = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("验证码");
	url = "https://www.himehear.com/tjapp/v1/user/loginV2";
	
	if(/@/.test(String(phone))){
		loginType = 2
		}else if(/^\d{11}$/.test(String(phone))){
			loginType = 1
			}
	
	body = {
		"verifyCode":String(code),
		"loginType":2,
		"account":String(phone)
		}
		
	option = {
		"method":"POST",
		"body":JSON.stringify(body)
		}
		
	url = url + "," + JSON.stringify(option);
	
	token =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).result.token;
	java.log(token);
	
	headers = {
		"token":String(token)
		}
			source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(headers));
	
	}

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
dramaPath = baseUrl.match(/.*\/(.*)/)[1];
java.log(dramaPath)
function re(a){
	a = String(java.encodeURI(a)).replace(/\+/g,"%20").replace(/\*/g,'%2A').replace(/%7E/g,'~').replace(/%2F/g,'/');
	return a;
	}
	
oss = JSON.parse(java.get("https://www.himehear.com/tjapp/v1/oss/ali/sts",source.getLoginHeaderMap()).body()).result;

sk = oss.accessKeySecret;
ak = re(oss.accessKeyId);
st = oss.securityToken.trim();

date = String(parseInt(Date.now()/1000+3600));

java.log(date);

data = "GET\n\n\n"+date+"\n"+"/tingjifm/"+dramaPath+"?security-token="+st;

sign = java.HMacBase64(data, "HMacSHA1", sk);

url = `https://tingjifm.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/${dramaPath}?Expires=${date}&OSSAccessKeyId=${ak}&Signature=${sign}&security-token=${re(st)}`;
</js>
